price: Moto utababua nyuso zao, nao watakuwa na nyuso zilizo kunjana.
arabic: تَلۡفَحُ وُجُوهَهُمُ ٱلنَّارُ وَهُمۡ فِيهَا كَٰلِحُونَ
footnotes: Moto utawababua nyuso zao, nazo zitakuwa zimekunjana kwa uwovu wa mwisho wao.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: talfaḥu wujūhahumu al-nāru wahum fīhā kāliḥūna
